rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious hall with marble flooring and decorative elements in line with Mediterranean aesthetics.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large living area with open windows for natural light and ventilation, featuring a central seating arrangement.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; designed with Mediterranean style decor and ample space for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully-equipped kitchen optimized for functionality and natural ventilation, includes an open window.

rooms.name: Family Room / Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Multi-purpose room adaptable as a guest bedroom or family gathering area.

rooms.name: Powder Room
rooms.description: Small washroom for guests, featuring tiled walls and efficient design.

rooms.name: Courtyard
rooms.description: Central courtyard providing natural light and ventilation, with decorative Mediterranean elements such as mosaic tiles and fountain.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large entry door complemented by a welcoming archway.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows promoting natural light and air flow.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: High ceiling windows allowing ample ventilation.

openings.name: Door
openings.description: Separate door ensuring privacy from the main living areas, while maintaining connectivity with the courtyard.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a private balcony and Vastu-compliant orientation for tranquility.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom with modern fixtures and natural ventilation, placed adjacent to the master bedroom.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable family bedroom, featuring a window for ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Dedicated room with ample natural light and Vastu aligned placement.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom to accommodate joint family members, designed for comfort.

rooms.name: Shared Bathroom
rooms.description: Family bathroom accessible from the upper level corridors.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Provides a private outdoor space with Mediterranean style railings.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Large windows to maximize daylight and ventilation.
